channel.title: Pokemon on DeerTopia
channel.description: Recent content in Pokemon on DeerTopia

item.title: Pokémon Red Disassembly: Modifying The Starters
item.description: This is a guide I originally wrote back in 2015 for an Italian Pokémon ROM hacking forum because nobody else had done so already, I thought I would translate and archive it here too since this site is meant to be a place for me to backup my work, old or new, I hope it can be useful even for just one curious soul who ever asked themselves: how can you change the three starters in pokered? Well, here is how.
